title: Mastering Flat Irons for Beautiful Hair - Nurberxo

asset.title: HSN | Nurberxo | Flat Irons
asset.description:
.
BEAUTY BASICS with Nurberxo | How To | Flat Irons

Shop HSN's flat irons at http://goo.gl/j5DtHD
Shop HSN's finishing products at http://goo.gl/mJbYaA

STEP #1:
-Use a heat protectant
-Set the temp for your hair type
-Run it through your hair the least number of times possible

STEP #2:
-Hold it curled in
-Use a fine-toothed comb as a guide

STEP #3
-Use gentle pressure
-Use a serum to finish your hair

BONUS TIP:
-You can curl your hair with a flat iron!
asset.author: HSN
